name: Sell Tickets Online From Your Website – TicketsCandy for WordPress
author: TicketsCandy

sections.description:
TicketCandy lets you sell tickets and turn your WordPress site in to an
online event ticketing and event registration system.

Support

  • Visit https://ticketscandy.com/support/ for help.
  • Email support [at] ticketscandy.com to get in touch with the support team.
sections.installation:
1. Unpack archive to this archive to the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory inside
    of WordPress

  2. From your blog administration, click on Settings -> TicketsCandy to change your settings.

  3. Sign up for an account at TicketCandy

  4. Set up your event registration page on WordPress

  5. Create your event in the TicketsCandy control panel.

  6. Embed the TicketsCandy WordPress Embed Code to add your event registration form to a page in WordPress

  7. Make your event live and start accepting event registrations

  8. Your customers can now register for your event from your WordPress website.

short_description: Sell event tickets online via your WordPress website. TicketsCandy is an easy event ticketing & event registration system.
